languages.text: "Вот и вы, Лорд-капитан". {n}Как только вы подходите ближе, горклый привкус разочарования проявляется на языке, сводя скулы.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Слышала, вы связали себя{/d}… определенными узами с другим членом свиты. Жаль, что вам не хватило духу прежде поставить точку в наших отношениях. Я бы… все поняла". {n}Кассия приподнимает подбородок, и дрожь в ее голосе отступает.{/n} "Но давайте оставим прошлое в прошлом. Чем навигатор может служить своему капитану?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот и вы, Лорд-капитан". {n}Как только вы подходите ближе, горклый привкус разочарования проявляется на языке, сводя скулы.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Слышала, вы связали себя{/d}… определенными узами с другим членом свиты. Жаль, что вам не хватило духу прежде поставить точку в наших отношениях. Я бы… все поняла". {n}Кассия приподнимает подбородок, и дрожь в ее голосе отступает.{/n} "Но давайте оставим прошлое в прошлом. Чем навигатор может служить своему капитану?"

languages.text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

Жаль, что вам не хватило духу прежде поставить точку в наших отношениях. "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

languages.text: «Ahí está, Lord Capitán». {n}En cuanto te acercas, sientes el sabor amargo de la decepción en la lengua, arrugándote el gesto.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}He oído que se ha vinculado{/d} de... cierta forma con otro miembro de su séquito. Es una lástima que carezca del valor de poner fin a nuestra relación antes de hacerlo. Lo habría... comprendido». {n}Cassia alza la barbilla y el temblor de su voz se calma.{/n} «Pero dejemos el pasado a un lado. ¿Cómo puede servir esta Navegante a su capitán?».
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

languages.text: 「こちらにいらっしゃったのですね、ロード・キャプテン」{n}近くまで歩を進めるや否や、失望が苦みとなって舌を刺し、泣きたいような気持になる。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}お聞きしました。陛下が{/d}…他のある従者の一人と結ばれたのだと。御身が事前にあたくしとの関係に終止符を打つ勇気をお持ちでなかったことは残念です。私なら…理解いたしましたのに」{n}カシアがあごを上げると、その声の震えが引く。{/n}「ですが、過去のことは忘れてしまいましょう。それで、航宙士はしっかり船長に仕えられそうでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

traits.locale_text: 「こちらにいらっしゃったのですね、ロード・キャプテン」{n}近くまで歩を進めるや否や、失望が苦みとなって舌を刺し、泣きたいような気持になる。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}お聞きしました。陛下が{/d}…他のある従者の一人と結ばれたのだと。御身が事前にあたくしとの関係に終止符を打つ勇気をお持ちでなかったことは残念です。私なら…理解いたしましたのに」{n}カシアがあごを上げると、その声の震えが引く。{/n}「ですが、過去のことは忘れてしまいましょう。それで、航宙士はしっかり船長に仕えられそうでしょうか？」

languages.text: “你来了，舰长大人。”{n}你才刚刚靠近，失望的苦涩就刺痛了你的舌头，让你不寒而栗。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}我听说你已经做出了选择{/d}……与另一位随行人员结合在了一起。真遗憾，你没能鼓起勇气，正式结束我们之间的关系。如果你说出来的话，我本来是……可以理解的。”{n}卡西娅扬起下巴，声音中的颤抖渐渐消失了。{/n}“不过，过去的事情就过去吧。现在，导航者该如何为她的舰长服务呢？”
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

languages.text: "Da seid Ihr ja, Lord Captain! {n}Als du nähertrittst, zuckst du angesichts des bitteren Geschmacks der Enttäuschung auf deiner Zunge zurück.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Ich hörte, Ihr habt Euch an ein{/d}... gewisses anderes Mitglied Eures Gefolges gebunden. Es ist bedauerlich, dass Ihr nicht den Mut hattet, erst unsere Beziehung zu beenden. Ich hätte es ... verstanden." {n}Cassia hebt ihren Kopf und das Zittern in ihrer Stimme verschwindet.{/n} "Aber lassen wir die Vergangenheit hinter uns. Wie kann die Navigatorin ihrem Captain dienen?"
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

languages.text: « Vous voilà, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}À peine avez-vous fait un pas vers elle que le goût amer de la déception vous brûle la langue et vous fait grimacer.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}J'ai entendu dire que vous aviez développé un certain{/d}... attachement pour une autre personne de votre entourage. Il est fort regrettable que vous n'ayez pas eu le courage de mettre un terme à notre relation au préalable. J'aurais... compris. » {n}Cassia relève le menton et sa voix cesse de trembler.{/n} « Mais laissons le passé derrière nous. La navigatrice peut-elle faire quelque chose pour {mf|son|sa} capitaine ? »
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"

languages.text: "İşte buradasın Lord Kaptan." {n}Yaklaşır yaklaşmaz hayal kırıklığının o keskin acı tadı, dilini yakarak seni ürpertiyor.{/n} "Duyduğuma göre maiyetinin başka bir mensubuyla yaşadığın... Özel bir ilişkiyle {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}aranızda bir bağ kurulmuş{/d}. Öncesinde ilişkimize son verecek cesaretten yoksun olman üzücü. Seni... Anlardım." {n}Cassia'nın çenesini kaldırmasıyla birlikte sesindeki titreme geçiyor.{/n} "Ancak geçmişi ardımızda bırakabiliriz. Rotacı kaptanına nasıl hizmet edebilir?"
languages.original_text: "There you are, Lord Captain." {n}As soon as you step closer, the bitter tang of disappointment stings your tongue, making you wince.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}I hear you have bound yourself{/d}... by certain ties to another member of the retinue. It is a pity you lacked the courage to put a stop to our relationship beforehand. I would have... understood." {n}Cassia raises her chin, and the tremor in her voice recedes.{/n} "But let us put the past behind us. How may the Navigator serve her captain?"
